text: What is a method of applying a material to a GameObject in the Unity Editor?

options.text: Drag the material from the Project window to the GameObject in the Scene view
Select the material from the Mesh Renderer component
Drag the material from the Project window to one of the Materials listed in the Mesh Renderer

feedbackCorrect: There are several ways to apply a material to GameObject. Practice them all and use the ones that work best for you!
feedbackIncorrect: Shaders and materials work together to define all the characteristics of a mesh surface during the rendering process. A material is an asset that works with a shader to define how meshes will be rendered.
